<?php

class PeThemeShortcodeBS_Divider extends PeThemeShortcode {

    public function __construct($master) {
        parent::__construct($master);
        $this->trigger = "divider";
        $this->group = __pe("UI");
        $this->name = __pe("Divider");
        $this->description = __pe("Add a divider");
        $this->fields = array(
                              "type"=> 
                              array(
                                    "divider" => __pe("Divider Type"),
                                    "type" => "Select",
                                    "description" => __pe("Select the type of divider required."),
                                    "options" => 
                                    array(
                                          __pe("Solid") => "solid",
                                          __pe("Dotted") => "dotted"
                                          ),
                                    "default" => "solid"
                                    )
                              );
    }

    public function output($atts,$content=null,$code="") {
        extract($atts);
        $html =<<<EOL
<div class="row-fluid">
    <div class="span12">
        <div class="divider $type clearfix"><span></span></div>
    </div>
</div>
EOL;
        return trim($html);
    }

}

?>

item.title: Alt Footer
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: This theme supports unlimited sidebars and footers. This means that if you so desire it, each of your pages can contain a different set of widgets in the footer area and/or sidebar area. In addition, the footer layout (number of columns) supports 3 different arrangements. This is set globally in the theme options inside the pixelentity framework. Check out the alternative footer arrangement below, any of the standard WP widgets or the pixelentity custom widgets can be used here. The logo on the left is a custom widget and can be removed if desired.

item.title: Code Snippets
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Syntax Highlighting  [label type="info"]PHP[/label]

<?php

class PeThemeShortcodeBS_Divider extends PeThemeShortcode {

    public function __construct($master) {
        parent::__construct($master);
        $this->trigger = "divider";
        $this->group = __pe("UI");
        $this->name = __pe("Divider");
        $this->description = __pe("Add a divider");
        $this->fields = array(
                              "type"=> 
                              array(
                                    "divider" => __pe("Divider Type"),
                                    "type" => "Select",
                                    "description" => __pe("Select the type of divider required."),
                                    "options" => 
                                    array(
                                          __pe("Solid") => "solid",
                                          __pe("Dotted") => "dotted"
                                          ),
                                    "default" => "solid"
                                    )
                              );
    }

    public function output($atts,$content=null,$code="") {
        extract($atts);
        $html =<<<EOL
<div class="row-fluid">
    <div class="span12">
        <div class="divider $type clearfix"><span></span></div>
    </div>
</div>
EOL;
        return trim($html);
    }

}

?>

Fixed Height Snippet Box CSS

/*black n white image rollower efects*/

    a.peOverBW, a.peOverInfo{
        width:100%;
        height:100%;
        position:relative;
        overflow:hidden;
        display:block;
    }

    a.peOverBW img, a.peOverInfo img{
        display:block;
    }

    /*image rollover info display effect*/

    a.peOverInfo img{
        display:block;
    }

    a.peOverInfo{
        width:100%;
        height:100%;
        position:relative;
        overflow:hidden;
        display:block;
    }

    /*semi-transparent overlay*/

    .peOverElementInnerBG{
        width:100%;
        height:100%;
        position:absolute;
        background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
        top:0;
        left:0;
        z-index:1;
        opacity:0;
        -ms-filter: "progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.Alpha(Opacity=0)";
        background-color: black;
    }

item.title: Blog Shortcode
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
This page shows the blog shortcode being used. With this shortcode there are 3 layout options "Full" "Conpact" and "Mini", each of these layouts are shown here below.  This shortcode can be used anywhere in the page templates, to show posts from the blog. As shown here below this shortcode can be used several times in the same page also.  Other options include specifying the number of posts to show, restricting the posts shown based on tags or categories,  including the post's media, including a post pager and much more. Try it out!

Full Layout

[blog count="1" media="yes" pager="no" sticky="yes" category="featured-image"]

Compacy Layout

[blog layout="search" count="2" media="yes" pager="no" sticky="yes"]  

Mini Layout

Sed pretium, ligula sollicitudin laoreet viverra, tortor libero sodales leo, eget blandit nunc tortor eu nibh. Nullam mollis. Ut justo. Suspendisse potenti. Sed egestas, ante et vulputate volutpat, eros pede semper est, vitae luctus metus libero eu augue. Morbi purus libero, faucibus adipiscing, commodo quis, gravida id, est. Sed lectus. Praesent elementum hendrerit tortor. Sed semper lorem at felis. Vestibulum volutpat, lacus a ultrices sagittis, mi neque euismod dui, eu pulvinar nunc sapien ornare nisl. Phasellus pede arcu, dapibus eu, fermentum et, dapibus sed, urna. Morbi interdum mollis sapien. Sed ac risus. Phasellus lacinia, magna a ullamcorper laoreet, lectus arcu pulvinar. [/col][/cols]

item.title: Project 09 Title
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Introducing a standard project example. Standard project types differs from an "Image" project in the way that the images are treated. An "Image" project auto adds a "responsive" lightbox to the the project images, while a standard project does not have a lightbox capability.

item.title: Project 10 Title
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. An image project uses a single image as the project content (featured image) and it auto adds our "responsive lightbox" to this image so that it may be viewed in fullscreen. Try it an see. Oh and one more thing, this lightbox has been custom built to work on mobile and tablet devices.
